SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_IS_SELECTED_CHILD_LOCKED_FOR_SPONSORSHIP_SELECTION
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Determines if a given child is selected (locked) for a sponsorship
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create FUNCTION USR_UFN_IS_SELECTED_CHILD_LOCKED_FOR_SPONSORSHIP_SELECTION ( -- Add the parameters for the function here @OPPORTUNITYID uniqueidentifier ) returns bit as begin -- Declare the return variable here declare @Result bit
-- Add the T-SQL statements to compute the return value here if exists(select OPPORTUNITYID from dbo.USR_CHILD_SELECTED_FOR_SPONSORSHIP_LOCK where OPPORTUNITYID = @OPPORTUNITYID) set @Result = 1; else set @Result = 0;
-- Return the result of the function return @Result
end
